simlib.analysis.peptide.compute_hydrophobic_moment¶

simlib.analysis.peptide.compute_hydrophobic_moment(sequence, offset=100.0, scale='wimley-white')[source]¶

Compute the hydrophobic moment from a sequence

Parameters

  • sequence (str or list of str) – Amino acid sequence

  • offset (float) – Angle (in degrees) between amino acids (Default: 100 degrees)

  • scale (str) – Hydrophobicity scale to use (Default: ‘wimley-white’)

Returns

Hydrophobic moment magnitude

Return type

float

Next topic
